trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of input that the grammar, defined by the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />, will match.
trans-unit.target: Indica o tipo de entrada à qual a gramática, definida pelo <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />, corresponderá.

trans-unit.source: The input mode for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> is determined by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O modo de entrada para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> é determinado pelo seu <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The default input mode is Voice, which indicates that the grammar defined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> will match speech input.
trans-unit.target: O modo de entrada padrão é de voz, o que indica que a gramática definida pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> corresponderá a entrada de fala.

trans-unit.source: The Dtmf mode indicates that a grammar will match Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency (DTMF) tones instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: O modo de Dtmf indica que uma gramática corresponderá tons de multi-frequência tom Dual (DTMF) em vez de fala.

trans-unit.source: There are 16 DTMF tones, 12 of which are commonly found on most telephones.
trans-unit.target: Há 16 tons DTMF, 12, que geralmente são encontrados na maioria dos telefones.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object will match the type of input specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property, which gets an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> de objeto um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objeto corresponderá ao tipo de entrada especificado pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> propriedade, que obtém uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object will match DTMF tones similar to those found on a telephone, instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> corresponderá tons DTMF semelhantes aos encontrados em um telefone, em vez de fala.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object will match speech input.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> corresponderá à entrada de fala.
